alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. John The Baptist, Ascension, St. James, northwestern St. Charles, Livingston, southwestern Tangipahoa and north central Lafourche Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Springfield, or 14 miles south of Hammond, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Reserve, Hahnville, Laplace, Ponchatoula, Gramercy, Lutcher, Livingston, Sorrento, French Settlement, Albany, Port Vincent, Springfield, Montz, Geismar, Garyville, Boutte and Whitehall. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 173 and 213. Interstate 12 between mile markers 18 and 38. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 30. Interstate 310 between mile markers 9 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist
